Package util

Class Datagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Datagram
  • public class Datagram
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to work with Datagram(Packet)s. Note: the DatagramPacket class could not be extended, because it is a final class
    Author:
    huub.lievestro

      • getDatagramSourceAddress

        public static java.net.InetAddress getDatagramSourceAddress​(java.net.DatagramPacket receivedDatagram)
        Get source address from received datagram. NOTE: only use on received datagrams, at sendingDatagrams it will be destinationAddress
        Parameters:
        receivedDatagram - to extract source addres from
        Returns:
        source address as InetAddress

      • createPacketFromDatagram

        public static Packet createPacketFromDatagram​(java.net.DatagramPacket datagram,
                                              java.net.DatagramSocket receivingSocket)
                                       throws PacketException,
                                              UtilDatagramException
        Create a Packet object from a received DatagramPacket Note: only works for received datagrams!
        Parameters:
        datagram - received, to create Packet from
        localSocket - on which the datagram was received
        Returns:
        Packet object, created from the datagram
        Throws:
        PacketException
        UtilDatagramException

      • buildDatagram

        public static java.net.DatagramPacket buildDatagram​(Packet packet,
                                                    int destinationPort)
                                             throws UtilDatagramException
        Create a DatagramPacket from a Packet.
        Parameters:
        packet - to create the datagram
        destinationPort - to send the datagram to
        Returns:
        datagramPacket, created from the Packet
        Throws:
        UtilDatagramException
